description:
The Holy Emperor`s forces` Garzus Squadron, attacks a young resistance member named Jay, and then the village where his fiance is hidden.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Chi no Juujiryou! Shuu! Sono Namida wa Ore no Kokoro de Uketomeyou!!
The Bloody Cross Mausoleum! Shu! I`ll Catch Your Tears with My Heart!!
血の十字陵! シュウ! その涙は俺の心で受けとめよう!!
